    • GameController

      public GameController(ArrayList<ClientHandler> list, UsernameIssuer usernameIssuer, GameCodeIssuer gameCodeIssuer)

    • GameController

      public GameController(UsernameIssuer usernameIssuer, GameCodeIssuer gameCodeIssuer, int gameCode)
      gameController constructor used in case of server disconnection
      Parameters:
      usernameIssuer -
      gameCodeIssuer -
      gameCode -

  • Method Details

    • setFolderPath

      public static void setFolderPath(String fp)

    • retrieveGameFromFile

      public void retrieveGameFromFile() throws FileNotFoundException
      Retrieves the game data from a file and initializes the game state. This method reads the serialized game object from the file, sets the necessary variables, and prepares the game environment.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the file containing the game data is not found.

    • initializeSaveFile

      public void initializeSaveFile()
      Initializes the save file for the game. This method creates a new save file with the appropriate file path and registers the game code in the game list file. The save file is used to store the model status of the game.

    • setGameCode

      public void setGameCode(int gameCode)

    • initGameEnv

      public void initGameEnv()
      Initializes the game environment. This method sends messages to all client handlers, informing them that the game is starting and providing them with the necessary game information, such as the board, shared goals, and private goals.

    • resetGameEnv

      public void resetGameEnv(int position)
      Resets the game environment for a reconnected player . Sends relevant game information and status to the player.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the player in the game.

    • startGameTurn

      public void startGameTurn()
      Starts game turn by notifying the current player to choose cards to remove from the board. Notifies other players about who is the currentPlayer.

    • removeCards

      public void removeCards(List<Coordinates> coordinates, List<Card> cards)
      removes the card from the board, stores them in game for bookshelf insertion. sends a message to all the players containing the coordinates of the cards to remove and the coordinates of the card to update to pickable
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates to remove (sent by the client)

    • insertInBookshelf

      public void insertInBookshelf(int column)
      Inserts player's card into the bookshelf at the specified column. Communicates if a sharedGoal is achieved, Calculate points, and send it. Updates the game state and communicates the changes to the players. Saves the game status.
      Parameters:
      column - The column where the player's card is inserted.

    • notifyNextPlayer

      public void notifyNextPlayer()
      if endGame is true and next player is the first one calls endGameMethod. Otherwise updates the currentPlayer, sends choose_card_message to the new current player and update_next_player_message to the other players.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Parameters:
      clientHandler -

    • disconnection

      public void disconnection(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Handles the disconnection of a client represented by the provided `clientHandler` object. If `destruction` is set to `true`, no disconnections are handled because the game has already closed.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - The `ClientHandler` object representing the disconnected client.

    • decreaseCountDown

      public void decreaseCountDown()
      Decreases the countDown value by 60. If the countDown value becomes equal to COUNT_DOWN - 1, it prints a message indicating that the countdown has started. If the countDown value reaches 0, it stops the decrementer, declares the winner, sends a end game message, and closes the game.

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves the current game state by serializing and writing the game object to the save file. If the save file already exists, its contents will be overwritten. If an exception occurs during file writing, it will be printed to the console.

    • readFileAndDeserialize

      public Game readFileAndDeserialize() throws RuntimeException
      Reads and deserializes the saved game object from the save file.
      Returns:
      The deserialized Game object.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an exception occurs during file reading or deserialization.
